languages.text: "Офицеров? Ха... Среди них больше нет тех, кто чист! Их заботят лишь власть и набитое брюхо, иначе бы они давно... давно обратились против тебя". {n}Послушник едва договаривает и заходится булькающим кашлем.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "А есть ли среди них отважные и чистые душой? Нет, твоим слугам есть забота лишь о власти и сытости своего брюха, иначе бы давно... давно обратились против тебя". {n}Послушник едва договаривает и заходится булькающим кашлем.{/n}

languages.text: "Officers? Ha! There is no one else among them who is pure! They only care about power and gorging themselves on the scraps you throw them, or else they would have long... long since turned against you." {n}Ziek can barely finish the sentence before he is beset by a torrent of gurgling coughs.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Офицеров? Ха... Среди них больше нет тех, кто чист! Их заботят лишь власть и набитое брюхо, иначе бы они давно... давно обратились против тебя". {n}Послушник едва договаривает и заходится булькающим кашлем.{/n}

"Officers? Ha! There is no one else among them who is pure! They only care about power and gorging themselves on the scraps you throw them, or else they would have long... long since turned against you." {n}Ziek can barely finish the sentence before he is beset by a torrent of gurgling coughs.{/n}

"Officers? Ha! There is no one else among them who is pure! They only care about power and gorging themselves on the scraps you throw them, or else they would have long... long since turned against you." {n}Ziek can barely finish the sentence before he is beset by a torrent of gurgling coughs.{/n}

languages.text: « Des officiers ? Peuh ! Pas un seul d'entre eux ne peut se targuer d'être pur ! Tout ce qui les intéresse, c'est le pouvoir et les miettes que vous leur jetez comme autant d'os à moelle, autrement il y a longtemps... qu'ils se seraient retournés contre vous ! » {n}C'est à peine si Ziek parvient à finir sa phrase avant d'être pris d'une violente quinte de toux.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Officers? Ha! There is no one else among them who is pure! They only care about power and gorging themselves on the scraps you throw them, or else they would have long... long since turned against you." {n}Ziek can barely finish the sentence before he is beset by a torrent of gurgling coughs.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Des officiers ? Peuh ! Pas un seul d'entre eux ne peut se targuer d'être pur ! Tout ce qui les intéresse, c'est le pouvoir et les miettes que vous leur jetez comme autant d'os à moelle, autrement il y a longtemps... qu'ils se seraient retournés contre vous ! » {n}C'est à peine si Ziek parvient à finir sa phrase avant d'être pris d'une violente quinte de toux.{/n}

languages.text: «¿Oficiales? ¡Ja! ¡Ni uno de ellos tiene una pizca de pureza! Solo les importa el poder y revolcarse en la chatarra que le manda usted, de no ser por eso haría ya bastante... bastante tiempo que se hubiesen revelado». {n}Ziek termina la oración y se ve acosado por un torrente de toses gorgoteantes.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Officers? Ha! There is no one else among them who is pure! They only care about power and gorging themselves on the scraps you throw them, or else they would have long... long since turned against you." {n}Ziek can barely finish the sentence before he is beset by a torrent of gurgling coughs.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿Oficiales? ¡Ja! ¡Ni uno de ellos tiene una pizca de pureza! Solo les importa el poder y revolcarse en la chatarra que le manda usted, de no ser por eso haría ya bastante... bastante tiempo que se hubiesen revelado». {n}Ziek termina la oración y se ve acosado por un torrente de toses gorgoteantes.{/n}

languages.text: 「士官ですか？まさか！彼らの中に汚れていない者などいません！奴らは権力と、あなたが投げ与える残飯を貪ることしか考えていない。さもなければ、とっくに…とっくにあなたに反発をしている」{n}ジークはこの言葉を言い終える前に、酷い咳でむせた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Officers? Ha! There is no one else among them who is pure! They only care about power and gorging themselves on the scraps you throw them, or else they would have long... long since turned against you." {n}Ziek can barely finish the sentence before he is beset by a torrent of gurgling coughs.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「士官ですか？まさか！彼らの中に汚れていない者などいません！奴らは権力と、あなたが投げ与える残飯を貪ることしか考えていない。さもなければ、とっくに…とっくにあなたに反発をしている」{n}ジークはこの言葉を言い終える前に、酷い咳でむせた。{/n}

languages.text: “那些军官？哈！他们里面没一个人是纯洁的！他们只在乎权力，只在乎你扔给他们的残羹剩饭，否则他们早就……早就揭竿而起了。”{n}齐耶克的话还没说完，就剧烈地咳嗽起来。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Officers? Ha! There is no one else among them who is pure! They only care about power and gorging themselves on the scraps you throw them, or else they would have long... long since turned against you." {n}Ziek can barely finish the sentence before he is beset by a torrent of gurgling coughs.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “那些军官？哈！他们里面没一个人是纯洁的！他们只在乎权力，只在乎你扔给他们的残羹剩饭，否则他们早就……早就揭竿而起了。”{n}齐耶克的话还没说完，就剧烈地咳嗽起来。{/n}

languages.text: "Offiziere? Ha! Keiner von denen ist rein. Sie denken nur an Macht und stürzen sich auf die Brocken, die Ihr ihnen hinwerft. Andernfalls hätten sie sich ... längst gegen Euch gewandt." {n}Ziek kann den Satz kaum zu Ende bringen, als er von einem keuchenden Hustenanfall geschüttelt wird.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Officers? Ha! There is no one else among them who is pure! They only care about power and gorging themselves on the scraps you throw them, or else they would have long... long since turned against you." {n}Ziek can barely finish the sentence before he is beset by a torrent of gurgling coughs.{/n}

Andernfalls hätten sie sich ... längst gegen Euch gewandt." {n}Ziek kann den Satz kaum zu Ende bringen, als er von einem keuchenden Hustenanfall geschüttelt wird.{/n}

languages.text: "Subay mı? Ha! Aralarında saf olan bir kişi daha yok! Onların önemsediği tek şey güç ve onlara fırlattığın artıkları kemirmek, yoksa çok ama çok uzun zaman önce sana sırt çevirmişlerdi." {n}Ziek cümlesini zar zor tamamlıyor, ardından şiddetli bir öksürük krizine tutuluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Officers? Ha! There is no one else among them who is pure! They only care about power and gorging themselves on the scraps you throw them, or else they would have long... long since turned against you." {n}Ziek can barely finish the sentence before he is beset by a torrent of gurgling coughs.{/n}
